sentences.en: And I don't want you, Cynthia or anyone eIse paying for my past sins.
sentences.cn: 我不会让你或是辛西亚其他人什么的为我的过失付出代价.

sentences.en: Audrey has gone with Cynthia to Von Sloneker's house party in Southampton.
sentences.cn: 奥德丽和辛西娅一起去了冯斯隆尼克在南安普敦的别墅.

sentences.en: Besides , I don't care what happens with you and Cynthia.
sentences.cn: 我才不管你同辛西娅两人发生什么事情呢.

sentences.en: But she said that Cynthia was visiting Audrey.
sentences.cn: 但是她说辛西娅去拜访奥德丽了.

sentences.en: Could you tell me , at least, when Cynthia and Audrey are getting back?
sentences.cn: 你至少要告诉我, 辛西娅和奥德丽什么时候能回来?

sentences.en: Cynthia located the Scotch, then ice and soda, and mixed two drinks efficiently.
sentences.cn: 辛西娅找到了威士忌, 还有冰和苏打水, 三下两下就调好了两杯酒.

sentences.en: Cynthia was brunette, her figure full, though not excessively.
sentences.cn: 辛西娅的皮肤和头发都是浅黑色的, 身材丰满, 但并不过分.

sentences.en: Cynthia's personality was more forceful and outgoing.
sentences.cn: 辛西娅的个性更加坚强、开朗.

sentences.en: He took me and my friend Cynthia to the movies in an open-topped car.
sentences.cn: 他开了辆敞篷车，载我和我的朋友辛西娅去看电影。

sentences.en: I couldn't let Cynthia get away with that nonsense about Von Sloneker.
sentences.cn: 除此之外我无法使辛西娅不去理睬冯斯隆尼克.

sentences.en: I told you before, I don't care what happens to Cynthia.
sentences.cn: 我之前就跟你说过, 我不在乎辛西娅怎么样.

sentences.en: I wouId hate to think you were pIacating me to taIk aBout Cynthia.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌去你来安放我去想辛西亚的事情.

sentences.en: Perhaps Cynthia kept away under their orders.
sentences.cn: 也可能辛西娅按照他们的命令躲开了.

sentences.en: So I called Cynthia's, and her mother answered.
sentences.cn: 然后我给辛西娅打电话, 她妈妈接的.
